title: Disclaimer
pageContent:
The material in this app/website is for educational purposes only.

The editors of this app/website have taken every effort to ensure that the information contained herein is accurate and conforms to the standards accepted at the time of publication. However, due to the constantly changing nature of the medical sciences and the possibility of human error, the reader is advised to exercise individual clinical judgement and consult with other sources of information that may become available with continuing research. 

The authors, contributors, reviewers, and editors are not responsible for errors or omissions or for any consequences from application of the information in this app/website and make no warranty, expressed or implied, with respect to the currency, completeness, or accuracy of the contents of the OCTcases app/website.

There are web sites and resources linked to and from this app/website that are operated or created by or for organisations, companies, or individuals not affiliated with OCTcases. These links are provided as a convenience and for informational purposes only; they do not constitute an endorsement or an approval by the authors, contributors, reviewers, and editors of OCTcases. The authors, contributors, reviewers, and editors of OCTcases bear no responsibility for the accuracy, security, legality, or content of the external sites linked in the OCTcases app/website or for that of subsequent links.
